Articles.Content:
> 
> I'll go see.
> EDIT: It only happens to select ones.

Thanks for trying

could you tell me which triggered the anti-virus and which didn't?

so I can see what they have in common and where are the differencies?

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It was the standalone Eve recolor. Had the same issue with another mod.

EDIT: It's working for me now.

> 
> It was the standalone Eve recolor. Had the same issue with another mod.
> EDIT: It's working for me now.

that's odd, I'm glad it's fine now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Bug report: the Eve recolor seems to remove the auroras with KSPRC. Top-down image of Eve:

![wNPxE58.png](http://i.imgur.com/wNPxE58.png)

my KSPRC doens't put auroras around Eve, are you sure you had auroras there?

anyway I've noticed that I should probably exclude the Auroras from being recolored, I'll release an hotfix tomorrow (it's late now)

thanks for the report!

Eve Recolor **v0.2.2** **** **HOTFIX**

- Removed recoloring of Auroras on Eve

Thanks to Whovian for reporting the issue ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Downloads

[![tV0Yh4r.png](http://i.imgur.com/tV0Yh4r.png)](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1067) [![MCbp3he.png](http://i.imgur.com/MCbp3he.png)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9941r6l2io78j53/SigmaEveRecolor.v0.2.2.zip)

This is very...very..Absolutely magnificient ! I really love what you did (and the presentation in the forum thread) !

> 
> This is very...very..Absolutely magnificient ! I really love what you did (and the presentation in the forum thread) !

thank you

I'm glad you like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

have you / do you plan to ....download some of the expansions?
I'd think it would cool if Pluron had a rocket ship or Kerbal on the side of it in reference to Pluto's heart ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
You were right; KSPRC doesn't add an aurora to Eve. My apologies.

>

> I'm glad you like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> have you / do you plan to ....download some of the expansions?

I did download PluronKhato (with SigmaBinary) and the Stock Recolor, with clouds. It's very nice.

> 
> I did download PluronKhato (with SigmaBinary) and the Stock Recolor, with clouds. It's very nice.

glad you liked it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I just noticed something. If Pluron detects OPM, it should probably edit Eeloo's description to mention Pluron instead of Plock.

> 
> I just noticed something. If Pluron detects OPM, it should probably edit Eeloo's description to mention Pluron instead of Plock.

yeah ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I'll fix that in the next release, unless plock gets revamped, because when that happens Pluron will be moved on a different orbit to be an addition more than a replacement
The next OPM update will probably be for moons of Neidon.
I was talking of my mod's next release ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Is this expected? 

> 
> [sCANsat] SCANsat resource celestial body config: [Khato] is empty; something probably went wrong here 
> (Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)
> 
> [sCANsat] No resources found assigned for Celestial Body: Khato, skipping...
> 
> (Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)
> 
> [sCANsat] SCANsat resource celestial body config: [Pluron] is empty; something probably went wrong here
> 
> (Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)
> 
> [sCANsat] No resources found assigned for Celestial Body: Pluron, skipping...

> 
> Is this expected?

I haven't provided any resources but I thought KSP added them automatically, I'll have to look into that.

thanks for reporting it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

have you tried with the stock scanner?

PS: are you also using SigmaBinary?

-edit-

I tried a clean install with pluron khato + scansat

everything seemed fine on pluron and khato.

but I'm not that experienced with scansat after 1.0 so I may be missing something

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-15T16:09:53Z" title="08/15/2015 04:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 15, 2015</time> by Sigma88**
No, I'm not using SigmaBinary. Gonna try tonight to see if it is related.

no, it shouldn't have any impact on the resources.

anyway, I've tried scanning using both scansat and the regular stock scan and both find ore around both khato and pluron.

keep in mind that kopernicus has some issues with resource overlay

[link](https://github.com/BryceSchroeder/Kopernicus/issues/78)

So, I was thinking to make a proper release thread for some of the expansions, would anyone have any problems with this mod being split into the different packages?

I think for a proper release it would be better to have:

1- Sigma: OPM Expansion (including Tilt + Recolor)

2- Sigma: RT Expansion (including Antennas + OuterSpaceComms)

3- Sigma: Pluron-Khato

4- Sigma: Stock Recolor

I would wait to release the last two, because they are not yet release-worthy in my opinion.

Single feature download will still be available of course, I'm not sure about the full download tho.

It's kinda weird to push out a new patch for the whole pack when I just need to update one of the features...
Would you mind if I made moons for Pluron-Khato?

> 
> Would you mind if I made moons for Pluron-Khato?

no problem, feel free to add it, put it in orbit around Pluron (or Khato) not the barycenter.

> 
> no, it shouldn't have any impact on the resources.

I reinstalled all mods again and deleted some other useless mods I was using. It seems the log messages are gone and the resources are being generated just fine. KSP is weird sometimes.
Do Pluron and Khato replace Eeloo or do Pluron and Khato go beyond Eeloo?
